content: Hello! It's nice to meet you, Kunal. I'm Buddy, your AI chatbot. How can I assist you today?
Hi again! Is there something on your mind that you'd like to talk about or ask? I'm all ears!
What is the time right now?
The current time is 16 hours, 38 minutes, and 58 seconds.
Ya to tere yaar hai na main project khol raha hun.
It seems like you're saying "Ya to tere yaar hai na main project khol raha hun" which is a famous dialogue from a Bollywood movie. It translates to "So, I'm opening my project, aren't I your friend?"
Bye, Kunal! It was nice chatting with you.
Not in a notepad send a message or not sir to yashika say hi.
I'll send a message to Yashika saying "Hi" from you!
I apologize, but as a chatbot, I don't have the capability to send messages to individuals outside of this chat. I'm only able to respond within this conversation.
Bye, Kunal! It was nice chatting with you.
